plugins.name: Stash Modes
plugins.description: This plugin enables you to "stash" variable modes within your Figma file. A stashed mode is essentially a copy of an existing mode. Although it is not directly accessible for pages and frames, you can later swap it back as a "real" mode. This feature proves handy when you want to experiment with different settings while preserving your original modes.
plugins.tagline: Save variable modes for later

plugins.name: Polaroids
plugins.description:
Polaroids – Bring a Touch of Nostalgia to Your Designs

Transform any frame into a beautifully styled Polaroid image—in seconds.


Polaroid Maker is your go-to tool for adding a warm, analog vibe to digital designs. Whether you’re building a moodboard, designing a presentation, or crafting a portfolio, this plugin helps you wrap your visuals in the charm of vintage photography.


Features:

Adjustable Padding – Control the spacing for that perfect Polaroid balance.


Customizable Corner Radius – Keep it sharp or go rounded for a softer feel.


Handwritten-style Captions – Add personality with a built-in handwriting font.


Stacking Options – Single, double, or multiple cards for layered vibes.


Shadow Effects – Add subtle or dramatic depth with three shadow styles.


Polaroid Maker was built to make visual storytelling more tactile, expressive, and fun—without needing any design hacks or frame juggling.
plugins.tagline: Turn any frame into a clean, customizable Polaroid.

plugins.name: Custom Table Generator
plugins.description:
Custom Table Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you design complex, fully customizable tables—without importing JSON, CSV, or any external data.


Designed for designers who demand precision and flexibility, this plugin gives you a smooth UI for building table structures from scratch, component by component.


Key features:

🧱 Component-friendly: build using Figma components, variants, and auto layout


🔧 Drag-and-drop column and row control


🎨 Full styling options: borders, spacing, colors, typography, alignment


📐 Advanced layout support (nested cells, merged rows, sticky headers, etc.)
plugins.tagline: Build complex, beautiful tables—without touching code or data files.

plugins.name: FillGPT
plugins.description:
FillGPT is an AI-powered Figma plugin designed to improve workflow efficiency by automating content generation, text optimization, and design analysis. It helps designers, copywriters, and product teams enhance UI copy, rename layers, and analyze design best practices.


Key features:


- Smart layer renaming to keep files organized

- AI-generated content for UI elements and marketing copy

- Copy enhancement, including expanding, shortening, and rephrasing text

- Tone and style adjustment to match different contexts

- Design analysis to improve clarity, accessibility, and readability

- Grammar and spelling error detection and correction

- Text summarization and expansion for better content flow


FillGPT streamlines the design process, ensuring high-quality text and a more efficient workflow within Figma.
plugins.tagline: Use ChatGPT and Gemini in figma

plugins.name: GPT To I18n
plugins.description:
GptToI18n是一款非常实用的插件工具！它不仅能够轻松地的一键生成i18n，还可以将设计稿瞬间转化为多种语言版本，让您轻松应对全球市场。




一键生成i18n json。这意味着您可以在不需要编写任何代码的情况下，自动将设计稿翻译成其他语言。这不仅可以节省您的时间和精力，还能提高工作效率。




我们推荐在草稿状态下完成，您只需要按住 ctrl + p 打开GptToI18n插件，选择您需要转换的范围和目标语言，然后点击获取JSON，只需要等待几秒就能完成 i18n JSON生成。可以看到的 Text name 也做了对应处理。




如果您需要将设计稿转换成目标语言版本，您只需要点击根据 JSON 翻译页面即可。




一键将设计稿转化为各种语言的版本。无论您的客户在世界的哪个角落，他们只需要打开您的设计稿，就可以立即理解您的产品。




当然，如果您没有输入OpenAi API 密钥，获取对应 JSON 需要消耗 tokens ，如果您有自己的OpenAi API 密钥，那么您可以尽情的使用。




所以，如果您是一个善于尝试新工具的人，那么GptToi18n绝对是一个不容错过的好选择。它不仅可以帮助您节省时间和精力，提高工作效率，还可以让您的产品更轻松地走进全球市场。快来试试吧，让它为您的工作带来更多的便利和成功！


GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!

plugins.name: Samenamer
plugins.description: This Figma plugin allows you to select and color all frames on the current page that share the same name as the frame you have currently selected. After selecting a frame, the plugin will scan the page for other frames with the same name and select them automatically. The selected frames will then be colored red to make them stand out. This can be useful for quickly identifying and grouping related design elements within a Figma file.

plugins.name: StyleSnap - Create AI Icons in Any Style
plugins.description:
Effortlessly create custom icons in any style with StyleSnap – the smart Figma plugin that brings AI-powered icon generation right where you work.


Whether you're designing a sleek UI or crafting a detailed illustration, StyleSnap lets you instantly replicate any icon style and generate new icons in seconds – all royalty-free and within Figma.


Perfect for designers who love consistency, speed, and creativity.


🎯 Right-Click Style Capture: Instantly capture the style of any icon in your Figma file with a simple right-click.


🖌️ AI-Powered Icon Generation: Describe the icon you want, and StyleSnap will create it to match the style you selected – from minimal to highly illustrative.


♾️ Style Agnostic: Works with any style – flat, outlined, detailed, 3D-inspired, or even hand-drawn.


🎨 Perfect for UI & Illustrations: Whether you're building out a clean interface or adding a creative touch, StyleSnap generates icons that feel perfectly on-brand.


🔓 Royalty-Free Icons: All generated icons are yours to use freely, with no licensing worries.


⚡ No Asset Library Needed: Skip the endless searches. Just pick a style, describe your icon, and go.


👨‍🎨 Great for Teams & Solo Designers: Maintain design consistency across projects without extra effort or asset juggling.


How to use the plugin?

  1. Install StyleSnap from the Figma Community.
  2. Right-click on any icon.
  3. Describe the new icon you need.
  4. Let the plugin generate it for you – in the exact style, ready to use and royalty-free.
plugins.tagline: Easily copy any icon style to create new icons in a snap

plugins.name: Clean Gradients
plugins.description:
Problem:

When using a standard gradient with two colors, if there is a large gap between their tones, the saturation in the middle decreases significantly, and the color in this area may appear grayish-resulting in a «muddy» shade.


Solution:

With just two clicks, the plugin eliminates the «muddy» effect in the middle of the gradient by adding three additional intermediate color stops.


How to use the plugin:

1. The colors for the initial gradient can be taken either from an existing gradient element by selecting it and clicking the «Pick gradient» button or by using the «Color Picker» tool on the left and right of the button.

2. To apply the gradient, select the desired element and click the «Apply gradient» button.
plugins.tagline: Cleans the gradient from «dirt»

plugins.name: logoplacer
plugins.description:
Logo Placer simplifies the process of adding multiple logos to your designs while maintaining clean spacing and visual consistency. Perfect for partner sections, client showcases, sponsor walls, and more.


Features:

Upload up to 4 logos with automatic placement

Smart resizing that maintains logo aspect ratios

Multi-frame support – Select multiple frames and place logos simultaneously

Dynamic scaling based on frame size

Equal spacing between logos, every time

Reset button to quickly start over

Clean and intuitive interface


Ideal For:

Creating partner/client sections

Designing sponsor walls

Showcasing collaborations

Building marketing materials

Presenting design portfolios


How to Use:

  1. Select one or more frames in your design
  2. Open the Logo Placer plugin
  3. Upload up to 4 logos
  4. Watch as they're automatically resized, placed, and spaced
  5. Hit reset to start fresh anytime


Why Use Logo Placer?

When you have a lot of design assets and deadlines, placing logos manually can be tedious and error-prone. You often deal with:


  1. Inconsistent sizing
  2. Uneven spacing
  3. Manual alignment headaches

Logo Placer removes that friction by automating placement and ensuring a professional layout every time—no grids, nudging, or guesswork needed.

plugins.name: Variables JSON Import
plugins.description:
Batch-import design tokens from JSON.


Thanks to Travis Spomer for the original version. <3


This Figma plugin converts Design Token Community Group (DTCG)-formatted JSON into Figma Variables.


Limitations

•Works in the Figma desktop app and Chrome.

Safari isn’t supported because browser file-access restrictions block the import.

•Not a full DTCG parser—some valid files may fail to load.


Supported token types

•string

•number / dimension / duration

•boolean

•Aliases to any supported token in the same JSON or Figma file

•Aliases to tokens in other JSON / Figma files (if those variables are published to a team library)


Open-source → https://github.com/thierryc/figma-variables-JSON-import

plugins.name: Autolayout converter Helper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly locate frames and take control of your design exploration!!!


Navigate to complex Figma layers with ease! This plugin helps you traverse design hierarchies by stopping at frames and allowing you to decide the next move. Customize your search—pause anywhere and pick it up whenever you're ready (at that moment perform your change at layer✨ ). Perfect for designers and developers who need precise, targeted frame navigation.


Key Features :

  1. Start Search from Any Node : Begin traversal from any selected layer in your Figma file, drilling down through layers and frames.
  2. Stop on Frame Detection : Pauses at each frame, allowing you to review, edit, or proceed to the next frame.
  3. Customisable Navigation : Choose from Next to continue, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause as needed.


Use Cases :

  1. Designers and Developers : Streamline work on large, complex Figma files with multiple frames and layers.
  2. Efficient Frame Location : Locate frames quickly, without tedious manual scrolling.
  3. Auto Layout Validation : Essential for platforms or projects requiring strict auto layout adherence for accurate design and responsive outputs. This plugin helps ensure each frame aligns to the full auto layout setup, ensuring optimal structure and consistency.
  4. Flexible Layer Exploration : Customize your traversal to focus on only the layers that matter most for faster design reviews and targeted edits.


How to Use :

  1. Select your starting node in Figma, click Start, and let the plugin begin searching.
  2. When a layer is detected, choose Next to proceed, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause where desired.


Boost productivity, stay organized, and manage complex Figma designs with this efficient layers finding plugin. Ideal for design reviews, auto layout validation, focused edits, and streamlined development workflows!
plugins.tagline: Navigate layers with ease: control traversal and reduce your manual drilling time by 40%

plugins.name: Mots AI
plugins.description:
Elevate your UI designs with this intelligent Figma plugin that generates smart, context-aware text tailored to your needs. Powered by advanced AI technology, it streamlines your content creation process, allowing you to quickly produce engaging copy for various UI components.


Seamless Integration:


This plugin seamlessly integrates with your existing Figma workflow. Simply highlight the text area in your design that requires content, specify the context, and select the appropriate UI component. It will generate customized, realistic text that perfectly complements your design, saving you valuable time and effort.


Intuitive User Experience:


Designed with user-friendliness in mind, this plugin boasts an intuitive interface that allows designers to focus on their creative process. It currently supports English language generation, with plans to expand language support in future updates. The plugin adapts to your needs, making it an indispensable tool for designers seeking to streamline their workflow and boost productivity.


How to use this plugin:


Select text area:


Highlight the text layer or frame in your Figma design where you need content generated.


Provide context:


Specify the context of your design, such as the user story and acceptance criteria, to ensure the plugin generates relevant and appropriate text.


Choose UI component:


Select the specific UI component (e.g., button, link) for which you need text.


Generate and refine:


Let the plugin work its magic. Review the generated text and, if needed, refine it to achieve the perfect fit for your design.


—



Got more ideas?


Send them our way at contact@juny.com


www.juny.ai

plugins.name: Component Viewer
plugins.description:
Component Viewer Plugin for Figma


Overview: The Component Viewer plugin enhances your design workflow in Figma by providing a quick and easy way to visualize all components and instances present on a page. With a simple button, you can activate or deactivate the highlighting of components, making it easier to manage and review your designs.


Features:

  1. Instant Visualization: Quickly view all components and instances on the current Figma page.
  2. Simple Toggle: Activate or deactivate the highlighting with a single button press. The button is centrally located for easy access.
  3. Custom Highlighting: Components and instances are displayed with a vibrant red fill when activated, making them stand out clearly against the design.
  4. Reset to Default: Deactivating the plugin restores the original appearance of your components, ensuring no permanent changes are made to your design.


User Interface:

  1. Centralized Toggle Button: The intuitive interface features a toggle button with two states:
  2. Activate: Displays components in red with white text.
  3. Deactivate: Returns components to their default state with a light grey background and black text.
  4. Responsive Design: The plugin interface is designed to be clean and user-friendly, ensuring a seamless integration into your Figma environment.


Use Cases:

  1. Perfect for designers looking to audit their components and instances within a project.
  2. Useful for collaborative sessions where multiple team members need to focus on specific design elements.


Installation: Simply select Component Viewer plugin from the Figma plugins menu, and you’re ready to streamline your design process!

plugins.name: Writing Assistant
plugins.description:
The AI Writing tools for designers

It helps you refine your UX copywriting, make it more concise, friendly, and scannable using AI.

  1. Super easy to use, one click to refine the copywriting
  2. 5 variants in one request
  3. Modifications are adjustable from light to heavy


How does it works?

The AI writer will analyze and refine your original content from three metrics: concise, friendly, and scannable. Just one click, you will get the refined copywriting, the changes of score of these three metrics can help you make decision from those 5 refined variants.


Scientifically define good copywriting

The model is base on Microsoft style guide, thanks to the efforts of these talented designers, we are able to know how to evaluate a copywriting and how to improve it.
plugins.tagline: Refine your UX copy writing to make it more concise, friendly and scannable.

plugins.name: PinNote
plugins.description:
Comunique com clareza. Colabore com eficiência.

Com o PinNote, você pode adicionar notas diretamente nos elementos do design. Cada nota pode ser classificada por categorias inteligentes como Acessibilidade, Desenvolvimento, Interações, Bug Report, Regra de Negócio, entre outras. Cada categoria oferece recursos específicos, como trechos de código, mensagens para leitores de tela, descrição de interações e links.


O plugin também permite criar categorias personalizadas com ícones e cores definidas por você! As notas são organizadas automaticamente, com posicionamento inteligente e numeração visual, facilitando a leitura mesmo em arquivos complexos.



Para quem é esse plugin?

O PinNote foi criado para:

  1. Product Designers que querem entregar projetos mais claros, documentados e colaborativos.
  2. UX/UI Designers que precisam deixar orientações específicas sobre interações, regras de negócio e acessibilidade.
  3. Desenvolvedores que desejam encontrar rapidamente tudo o que precisam para implementar uma interface com fidelidade.
  4. Líderes de produto e stakeholders que querem acompanhar decisões de design com transparência.
  5. Times multidisciplinares que buscam reduzir fricções no processo de handoff e ganhar eficiência.



FAQ - Perguntas Frequentes

Como faço para mover uma nota depois de criada?

R: As notas podem ser movidas normalmente como qualquer outro elemento do Figma. Basta selecionar e arrastar para a nova posição. O indicador numérico permanecerá vinculado ao elemento original.


É possível editar uma nota existente?

R: Sim, basta dar duplo clique na nota para abrir o modo de edição. Você pode modificar título, descrição, código e outros campos. A tag principal não pode ser alterada para manter a consistência.


Como funciona a numeração automática?

R: A numeração é sequencial por elemento. Quando você habilita a numeração, o plugin mantém um contador global e atribui o próximo número disponível. A numeração persiste mesmo se você deletar notas intermediárias.


As cores das tags são personalizáveis?

R: Cada tag tem uma cor padrão otimizada para legibilidade, mas elas podem ser alteradas de acordo com as preferências do usuário. As tags estão definidas por default como:

- Acessibilidade: #00EEFF

- Desenvolvimento: #55EF71

- Nota: #F9E444

- Alterações: #FF9925

- Regra de negócio: #CD79F4

- Interações: #FF5959

- Bug report: #FF59C8


Existe um limite de notas por elemento?

R: Não há limite técnico, mas por questões de organização e legibilidade, recomendamos não criar mais que 3-4 notas por elemento.


Como as notas são organizadas quando há várias no mesmo elemento?

R: O plugin posiciona as notas automaticamente, primeiro tentando à direita e depois abaixo das notas existentes, mantendo um espaçamento de 16px entre elas.


O plugin funciona com componentes do Figma?

R: Sim, o plugin funciona com qualquer elemento selecionável do Figma, incluindo componentes, instâncias, grupos e frames.


Outros usuários podem ver minhas notas?

R: Sim, as notas são visíveis para todos que têm acesso ao arquivo do Figma. O nome do autor e timestamp são preservados para manter o histórico.


É possível comentar em notas existentes?

R: Atualmente não há sistema de comentários nas notas, mas você pode usar o sistema de comentários nativo do Figma para discutir sobre uma nota específica ou editar o conteúdo da nota.


Posso criar tags personalizadas?

R: Sim, usando a opção "Personalizado" você pode definir sua própria cor e ícone para a tag. As configurações são salvas para reutilização.


Quais idiomas o PinNote suporta?

R: O PinNote possui suporte para os idiomas português (padrão), inglês e espanhol, permitindo que você utilize o plugin no idioma que preferir.


Posso desativar a exibição do nome do autor e da data nas notas?

R: Sim! É possível ocultar o nome do autor e a data de criação das notas através do botão mais opções, deixando a visualização mais limpa conforme sua necessidade.


Dá para desativar a criação dos marcadores numéricos nas notas?

R: Sim, você pode desativar a criação dos indicadores, através do botão mais opções, para que as notas fiquem sem numeração visual, caso prefira um layout mais simples.


Como personalizar as cores das tags?

R: Você pode escolher cores diferentes das definidas por padrão para as tags. O PinNote sugere cores acessíveis, alinhadas às diretrizes WCAG, para garantir boa legibilidade. Além disso, é possível inserir qualquer cor personalizada usando códigos hexadecimais, acessando a opção “mais cores”.
plugins.tagline: Facilite a comunicação no Figma com notas visuais que destacam informações importantes no seu design
